column2: "I was finally able to return since the aftermath of the lab's... I mean VOID's... shutdown."
"I didn't find Lillipa unplesant, but I must say, there's no place like home."
"Is that so? I wouldn't mind having to live there."
"If something were to happen, it'd be easier to protect the lilipans, too!"
"Indeed, it would be helpful to have ground troops stationed in the event of an assault."
"But at the same time, I feel it is my responsibility as a scientist to conduct further research."
"With more data, we might one day be able to forecast future Darker, or even Falz, attacks!"
"That's why I want to spearhead the operation, to lead the way!"
"...I'm sorry. I did it again... Haste makes waste, but an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure."
